title: Miley Cyrus Shares Video for New Song “End of the World”: Watch
description: The latest single from Something Beautiful arrives the same week as “Prelude” and the album’s title track
author: Walden Green
excerpt: The latest single from Something Beautiful arrives the same week as “Prelude” and the album’s title track
text: The latest single from Something Beautiful arrives the same week as “Prelude” and the album’s title trackMiley Cyrus has shared another taste of her forthcoming album, Something Beautiful. “End of the World” arrives the same week as “Prelude” and the record’s title track, the former of which was co-written with Model/Actriz frontman Cole Haden. The single’s accompanying video was directed by Cyrus, Jacob Bixenman, Brendan Walter, and features the pop musician performing the song on a smoke-filled stage in an Emerald green, fringed Mugler dress. Watch it below.Something Beautiful arrives May 30 via Columbia, with an accompanying album-length film to follow shortly thereafter. The record was executive produced by Miley Cyrus and Shawn Everett, who worked on “End of the World” alongside Michael Pollack, Jonathan Rado, and Maxx Morando. Earlier this year, Cyrus won Best Country Duo/Group Performance at the 2025 Grammy Awards for her Beyoncé duet “II Most Wanted.”Revisit our reviews of Miley Cyrus’ 2023 album Endless Summer Vacation and its hit single, “Flowers.”
html:
The latest single from Something Beautiful arrives the same week as “Prelude” and the album’s title track

Miley Cyrus has shared another taste of her forthcoming album, Something Beautiful. “End of the World” arrives the same week as “Prelude” and the record’s title track, the former of which was co-written with Model/Actriz frontman Cole Haden. The single’s accompanying video was directed by Cyrus, Jacob Bixenman, Brendan Walter, and features the pop musician performing the song on a smoke-filled stage in an Emerald green, fringed Mugler dress. Watch it below.

Something Beautiful arrives May 30 via Columbia, with an accompanying album-length film to follow shortly thereafter. The record was executive produced by Miley Cyrus and Shawn Everett, who worked on “End of the World” alongside Michael Pollack, Jonathan Rado, and Maxx Morando. Earlier this year, Cyrus won Best Country Duo/Group Performance at the 2025 Grammy Awards for her Beyoncé duet “II Most Wanted.”

Revisit our reviews of Miley Cyrus’ 2023 album Endless Summer Vacation and its hit single, “Flowers.”
